display.title: Acquire: buildinggadgets2:gadget_building
description: A fancy tool to help with base building. The gadget has different modes that you can view by holding the relevant hotkey - it defaults to &&eG&&r.
Be sure to check out the &&3Destruction Gadget&&r and the &&3Copy Paste Gadget&&r.

You &&6should&&r be able to charge this in the charger slot of any &&bGregTech machine&&r, but unfortunately, this is currently &&cbugged&&r. Have a look at the &&dTurbo Charger&&r quest in the top-right of this page if you want to charge this.

subtitle.text: A familiar face in the land of Greg
